short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Authenticate with websites using the decentralized trust of KERI and ACDC, plus centralized roots of trust including GLEIF vLEIs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KERI Auth enables you to authenticate and authorize yourself with websites requiring the strong security and authenticity guarantees based on decentralized identity with KERI identifiers, ACDC credentials, and roots of trust including GLEIFâ€™s vLEI ecosystem.

Websites need to support the polaris-web interfaces. Users will need to arrange to use a KERI Agent Service (KERIA), a cloud agent, as a prerequisite.  For more information, see https://github.com/webOfTrust/polaris-web, https://github.com/webOfTrust/keria, and https://keriauth.com/.
